import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' import { Navigate } from 'react-router-dom' import '../Styles/PersonalAccount.css' import '../Styles/Login.css' const DashboardRedact = ({ onCancel }) => { const { user, setUser } = useAuth() // предполагается, что есть setUser для обновления данных useEffect(() => { console.log('DashboardRedact mounted') alert('DashboardRedact mounted') }, []) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ lastName: user?.lastName || '', firstName: user?.firstName || '', middleName: user?.middleName || '', birthDate: '', // данные отсутствуют в Dashboard, добавим поле для ввода gender: '', // данные отсутствуют в Dashboard, добавим поле для ввода documentType: '', documentNumber: '', documentIssueDate: '', documentIssuer: '', snils: '', addressCity: '', addressStreet: '', addressHouse: '', addressBuilding: '', addressApartment: '', }) const [showNotification, setShowNotification] = useState(false) if (!user) { return } const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })) } const handleSave = () => { alert('handleSave called with formData: ' + JSON.stringify(formData)) console.log('handleSave called with formData:', formData) if (setUser) { alert('Calling setUser...') setUser(prevUser => ({ ...prevUser, lastName: formData.lastName, firstName: formData.firstName, middleName: formData.middleName, // остальные поля можно добавить в user, если структура позволяет })) alert('setUser finished') } setShowNotification(true) setTimeout(() => setShowNotification(false), 3000) } return (
  • Личный кабинет

) } export default DashboardRedact
